block.p: I am an 11-year-old girl, and I know what girls think about. The new President Barbie doll (Op-Ed, May 1) teaches girls that even if you aren't a boy, you can be president. Barbie's been around for so long that girls look up to her, and now they have an even better reason to, since she's president.

I am an 11-year-old girl, and I know what girls think about. The new President Barbie doll (Op-Ed, May 1) teaches girls that even if you aren't a boy, you can be president. Barbie's been around for so long that girls look up to her, and now they have an even better reason to, since she's president.
My 5-year-old sister, Charlotte, said she knows that being president means being ''boss.'' President Barbie shows girls that they can be the boss just as boys can.
We're on our way to a revolution of girls' power, and President Barbie is going to help us get there.
